TopicTitle: Pros And Cons.... Everyone Can Fly Like Superman Tomorrow

Articles.Content:
Pros: Feet hurt? Hover and fly. Something too high to reach? Hover up. Want to mess with birds? Now you can... but trust me you will regret it. Birds are rather adept at dive bombing and nipping creatures they see as a threat. Commute to work just got easier. Flight to the moon and elsewhere is more possible, since now all it takes is a habitat pod and enough flying humans for thrust LOL.

 

Cons: Crime. Oh. No. Guns will probably be outlawed, since now any group can rain down terror from above. Terrorism goes up again, and now important buildings carry AA guns.

 

What do you think?

Pros: Every time when two supermen have collided, we can gather loot from ground. Just wash it then.

Cons: Should avoid open places or have a good reaction to dodge.

P.S.
Why that genderism? A superhuman or a superperson.

Edited May 27, 2020 by kerbiloid

Pros: The smelly passenger next to you, and who is taking all the armrest for himself is not a problem anymore.

Cons: The number of mid-air collisions with wildlife has exploded.
One more con: wind power plants.

19 hours ago, kerbiloid said:

Why that genderism? A superhuman or a superperson

It's really not 'genderism' superman was the og superhero to fly. (I think) So typically when thinking of the power of flight, most folk'll think of him instead of 'superperson' xyz. Better stay clear of this topic, I don't want to unleash the wrath of the moderators...

pro-cheap flights to the moon

con-people pass out from lack of O2 at high altitude, and fall to the ground.

so they can just fly, they cant stop bullets or anything like that. i think id get a couple shotguns just in case. 

Edited May 30, 2020 by Nuke
